Class TSLine<T>

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.component.SimulationComponent
microsim.simulation.component.TSLine<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of data on line
public class TSLine<T> extends SimulationComponent
Models a 3-state logic line. Offers 2 main features: one driver/multiple readers functionality, and step-synced buffering for received data.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private T
    bufferedData
    Buffered data, gets updated the moment driver calls drive(SimulationComponent, T).
    private T
    committedData
    Committed data (visible from reads), gets bufferedData's value when component is stepped.
    private SimulationComponent
    driver
    Component that is currently driving this line.

    • driver

      private SimulationComponent driver
      Component that is currently driving this line.

    • committedData

  • Method Details

    • step

      public void step()
      Propagates bufferedData to committedData.
      Specified by:
      step in class SimulationComponent

    • drive

      public void drive(SimulationComponent driver, T data)
      Used by components to drive this line. Driver cannot be null, and cannot attempt to drive already driven line.
      Parameters:
      driver - component requesting to become driver
      data - data to drive line with

    • release

      public void release(SimulationComponent driver)
      Used by drivers to release line. Null drivers and drivers who don't own the line cannot release it.
      Parameters:
      driver - driver requesting release

    • read

      public T read()
      Reads data (committed).
      Returns:
      committed data on line
